Detailed Description

Widget that holds docked DzDockWindow widgets.

void DzDockArea::getDockPreview ( DzDockWindow *  window,
const QPoint &  globalPos,
QPoint &  p1,
QPoint &  p2 
) const

For providing visual feedback. Sets p1 and p2 (in global screen coordinates) so a line between them shows where a dock would take place if a dock window was dropped at distance offset from the top or left side (depending on its location) of the column. If no dock would take place, p1 ad p2 are both set to (0, 0).

Parameters:
window A pointer to the window to calculate a preview for.
globalPos The position where the dock would take place in global coordinates.
p1 This point is set to the starting position of the preview in global coordinates.
p2 This point is set to the ending position of the preview in global coordinates.
int DzDockArea::getNumColumns (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The number of columns of docked windows currently being displayed in this dock area.
